name: Yard
longDesc:
You are in the YARD.
A hatch to the BASEMENT LAB is on the corner of the house,
and a door to the DINING ROOM is on the side.
You can also step onto the FRONT PORCH from here.
An eagle flies overhead. Don't make eye contact with it if you don't want it to notice you!
description:
You are in the YARD.
From here you can reach the BASEMENT LAB, DINING ROOM, and FRONT PORCH.

sandbox.name: sandbox
sandbox.description: There is a sandbox full of beach toys and buckets.
sandbox.discoveryStatement: There's lots of SAND in here too.

sand.name: sand
sand.description: The sand is a uniform light brown.
